product_name: Thule Locking Bed-Rider Bike Carrier Add-On Block
long_description: The Thule Locking Bed-Rider Add-On Block attaches to Bed-Rider(TM) bike carrier (sold separately) to increase the bike carrying capacity. Included One-Key(TM) cylinder locks the bike to the carrier. Fits most bikes with disc brakes; simple, tool-free installation.
short_description: The Thule Locking Bed-Rider Add-On Block attaches to Bed-Rider(TM) bike carrier (sold separately) to increase the bike carrying capacity.
